scripts.start: cd server; NODE_ENV=production node dist/app.js; cd ..;
scripts.build: npm run build-server; npm run build-client
scripts.build-server: cd server; rm -rf dist; npm run build; cd ..;
scripts.build-client: cd client; rm -rf dist; npm run build-prod; cp -pPr dist/client ../server/dist; cd ..;
scripts.install: npm run clean; npm run install-server; npm run install-client
